summary.para: Performs a scaled hyperbolic tangent activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
Where tanh(x) is the hyperbolic tangent function.
This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SCALED_TANH_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SCALED_TANH_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SCALED_TANH_OPERATOR_DESC.Alpha
member.summary: The value of alpha. A typical default for this value is 1.0.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_SCALED_TANH_OPERATOR_DESC.Beta
member.summary: The value of beta. A typical default for this value is 0.5.
